title: Justice (Mutual Recognition of Custodial Sentences) Act 2023 (No. 3 of 2023)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Mutual Recognition of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Mutual Recognition of 

Custodial Sentences) Act 2023 (Commencement) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (mutual recognition custodial sentences) act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: Justice (Mutual Recognition of Custodial Sentences) Act 2023 (No. 3 of 2023)
heading: 2. The 3rd day of May 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Criminal
text_raw:
2. The 3rd day of May 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Criminal 
Justice (Mutual Recognition of Custodial Sentences) Act 2023 (No. 3 of 2023) 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 May, 2023. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Justice 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [213] 3
